titles.title: I Hear the Words of Love

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I hear the words of love, I gaze upon the blood, I see the mighty sacrifice, and I have peace with God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: ’Tis everlasting peace, sure as Jehovah’s name; ’tis stable as His steadfast throne, for evermore the same.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: The clouds may go and come, and storms may sweep my sky; this blood-sealed friendship changes not, the cross is ever nigh.

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines: My love is oftimes low, my joy still ebbs and flows, but peace with Him remains the same; no change Jehovah knows.
